text: Ricky Ponting, the newly appointed head coach of the Punjab Kings in the Indian Premier League (IPL), recently won the Major League Cricket (MLC) title with the Washington Freedom, where Steve Smith was the captain of the team. This achievement came after Ponting was released from his role as head coach of the Delhi Capitals in July this year.

* James Anderson, England's all-time leading Test wicket-taker, is being considered for participation in the 2025 MLC tournament.
* Discussions are underway between Anderson and an unnamed MLC team regarding his potential involvement in the tournament.
* Anderson could potentially earn around Â£135,000 for his participation.
* The MLC has attracted high-profile players in previous editions, including Pat Cummins, Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, and Travis Head.
* The Washington Freedom team, coached by Ricky Ponting, won the 2024 tournament.
* The 2025 MLC tournament is scheduled to take place, with Anderson's potential participation marking a new chapter in his illustrious career.
* The MLC's ability to attract cricketing legends like Anderson highlights the growing appeal of the T20 format.
